jobDescription: The Challenge We’re looking for an experienced Principal Scientist to bring Adobe’s heritage of content and data management tools to the world in an entirely new way. You will be working on a small, innovative team with little hierarchy. You will directly influence engineering and product decisions. We are already working with modern technologies and practices, come help us take it to the next level. You will be joining a diverse team that knows when it is time to cut loose and have some fun and when it is time to be heads down working towards a goal. You get the agility of a startup and the work/life balance of an established business.  You will be working on an emerging project designing and implementing the future of content management. As we grow, we need to ensure that our backend evolves with the rest of the product. We will be looking for your backend leadership.  What you'll do Develop frameworks for testing, explorations or for deployment of new technologiesDefine innnovative architecture approaches for the next generation of content mgmtCreate prototype of cloud services and integrate them into existing Adobe productsDevelop and deploy AI-based software in the cloud and on web and mobile platforms What you'll need to succeed Strong technical expertise in web technology, particularly REST-based APIsStrong technical communications and leadership skillsStrong programming skills (expertise in Java and Node.js a plus)10+ years working in a software development5+ years working as a software architectMS/PhD in technical field At Adobe, you will be immersed in an exceptional work environment that is recognized throughout the world on Best Companies lists. You will also be surrounded by colleagues who are committed to helping each other grow through our unique Check-In approach where ongoing feedback flows freely.  If you’re looking to make an impact, Adobe's the place for you. Discover what our employees are saying about their career experiences on the Adobe Life blog and explore the meaningful benefits we offer.  Adobe is an equal opportunity employer.
